name: Q Light Controller+ Workspace File
summary: Learn about .QXW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Functions that may be included in a QXW file are scenes, chasers, sequences, EFX, RGB matrices, collections, shows, and audio. Each function provides different capabilities and can be added to a workspace by clicking the "Functions" tab in the interface and selecting a function.

You can create a new workspace in QLC+ by selecting the document icon on the left side of the menu bar, then save it in a QXW file by selecting the floppy disk icon in the menu bar. You can open a workspace stored in a QXW file by selecting the blue folder icon in the menu bar.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
